EmailTemplate.subject: Hybrid Cloud Optimization Across the Data Center, Azure, and Kubernetes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/case-studies/fortune-500-healthcare-success-story]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
At a Fortune 500 Healthcare Company with multiple data centers and a growing Azure environment, safely increasing utilization on-premises while effectively managing their Azure workloads, and running Kubernetes in production is of the utmost importance.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/case-studies/fortune-500-healthcare-success-story]]>
With Turbonomic, the organization tripled the number of VDIs hosted on the same hardware footprint and savedÂ 20% off their monthly cloud bills by optimizing their Azure environment.
Interested in learning more? See how over 1,900 of our customers <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/case-studies]]> leverage workload automation to optimize performance, cost and policy compliance in real-time.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
